ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:21:16 [Issue ID 4000-74215] urn:comicvine:4000-74215 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 23:56:38. [Issue ID 93829]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The New Expandable Severolet...: Phony ad for Severolet, a car that comes in sections and can expand to any desired length.
Free Fall Ferris: Story about a mouse who becomes a U.S. astronaut.
Scenes We'd Like To See: The Runaway Stagecoach: Cowboy tries to save a woman in a runaway stage coach by jumping from his horse onto one of the runaway horses... but falls on the ground.
Gringo: Rules for a fictitious board game.
New Designs In Television Sets: Examples of types and uses of television remote controls.
Dining Etiquette Quiz: Quiz with bad examples of dining practices.
The Man In The Soot-Gray Flannel: Major scenes from the movie, with captions instead of dialog.
Rare Old Cartoons: Hans Huckerbein der Young Hard-Luck Raven: Fritz captures a raven, Hans, and brings it home where it destroys the place until it drinks some wine and dies tangled in some rope. The moral is loosely given as the bad you do will catch up with you.
Alfred E. Neuman Answers Your Questions: Advice for a man who loses everything and wants to hang himself.
Camp: Story of Melvin's summer at Camp Pot-Ra-Zee-Bee.
Hot Weather Photos: Collection of typical newspaper photos taken to show hot summer weather.
Scenes We'd Like To See: Escaping The Cannibals: A man and a woman are running to escape cannibals and she twists an ankle, whereupon the man runs away as the cannibals close in, instead of carrying her.
Scenes We'd Like To See: The Day of The Big Race: After a jockey is fired for taking a bribe, the owner's granddaughter volunteers to ride in the big race. She loses.
Convention Forecasts: Predictions for political convention personnel whose names resemble famous politicians.
Real Estate Ads: The Furds find an attractive real estate ad only to be disappointed by the actual home.
Alfred E. Neuman Answers Your Questions: Advice for a man whose wife plays the tuba at night.
Energetic 17-Year-Olds Are Happy Happy Happy: A look at a teenage Rock 'n Roll Romp party and aftermath.

ComicInfo.Writer: Al Feldstein,Jerry De Fuccio,Phil Interlandi,Ernie Kovacs,Harvey Kurtzman,Basil Wolverton,Wilhelm Busch
ComicInfo.Penciller: Wally Wood,Phil Interlandi,Bill Elder,Jack Davis,Basil Wolverton,Wilhelm Busch,Don Martin,Jack Kamen
ComicInfo.Inker: Wally Wood,Phil Interlandi,Bill Elder,Jack Davis,Basil Wolverton,Wilhelm Busch,Don Martin,Jack Kamen
